Description: * {{PageRef|Breakable}} {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}} rescaled from 28.5 + 2.375/min to 23 + 2.6/min
* {{PageRef|Trooper}} resistance near base reduced from 40% to 35%
* Fixed a bug where {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} can be invisibly carried on the hero by throwing it in certain areas like the air vents
* Fixed {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s near the base gaining the "near base" trooper resist
* Added news kiosk structure in between Mid Lane {{PageRef|Walker}} and base entrance
* Added wall partition structures outside of Outer Lane base entrances
* Improved lighting in {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} area
* {{PageRef|Restorative Shot}}: Now only procs when the center pellet hits (in the case of shotguns, like how {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}} works)
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}: Now requires the center pellet hit the head hitbox to count
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Cooldown increased from 10s to 16s
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Duration increased from 4s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: No longer grants +125 Bonus Health
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Now grants +10% Bullet Resistance
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: While active, you gain +40% Slow Resistance
* {{PageRef|Melee Charge}}: Fixed always giving 25% more damage against objectives
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Now requires the center pellet hit the head hitbox to count
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Bonus Headshot Damage now scales with Boons rather than Spirit Power (5.0 per Boon)
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Bonus Headshot Damage reduced from 100 to 75
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Heal now scales with Boons rather than Spirit Power (0.1 per Boon)
* Cultist Sacrifice: Out of Combat Regen reduced from 4 to 2
* Cultist Sacrifice: Weapon Damage vs NPC reduced from 35% to 30%
* Cultist Sacrifice: Bullet Resist vs NPC reduced from 35% to 30%
* Cultist Sacrifice: Fire Rate reduced from 25% to 10%
* Cultist Sacrifice: Fire Rate now scales with Boons (1.25%)
* Cultist Sacrifice: Health Bonus reduced from 250 to 100
* Cultist Sacrifice: Health Bonus now scales with Boons (11)
* {{PageRef|Blood Tribute}}: Fire Rate increased from 35% to 40%
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: Fixed shotguns with express shot instantly applying buildups
* {{PageRef|Crippling Headshot}}: No longer has a 3s cooldown
* {{PageRef|Crippling Headshot}}: Debuff duration reduced from 10s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Armor Piercing Rounds}}: Bullet Velocity increased from 30% to 35% (to match the component)
* {{PageRef|Crushing Fists}}: Fixed always giving 25% more damage against objectives
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Now a T3 item
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Base heal increased from 260 to 325
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Heal now scales with Boons rather than Spirit Power (7 per Boon)
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Now grants +8 Spirit Power
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Cooldown reduced from 70s to 60s
* {{PageRef|Counterspell}}: Duration increased from 0.8s to 1s
* {{PageRef|Spellbreaker}}: Fixed it affecting {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}'s {{PageRef|Soul Exchange}}
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Cooldown increased from 0.7s to 0.8s
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Fixed various bugs with stat stealing and {{PageRef|Capacitor}}/{{PageRef|Debuff Remover}}
* {{PageRef|Superior Cooldown}}: Cooldown Reduction reduced from 26% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Tankbuster}}: Fixed various bugs when multiple abilities hit on the same frame
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Damage no longer procs item effects (like {{PageRef|Affliction}})
* {{PageRef|Lightning Scroll}}: Fixed bugs when used with {{PageRef|Refresher}}
* {{PageRef|Boundless Spirit}}: Spirit % bonus increased from +10% to +13%
* {{PageRef|Vortex Web}}: Adjusted cast arc to be more similar to other grenades
* {{PageRef|Mercurial Magnum}}: Fixed an interaction bug with {{PageRef|Split Shot}}
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Health growth per boon reduced from 81 to 78
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} Damage Regenerated increased from 10% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} T3 increased from 5% to 6%
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Various network related fixed for {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}}
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} wall stun from 0.85s to 0.6s
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} T2 changed from -12s Cooldown to +0.45s Wall Stun
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} T3 changed to -18s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} cooldown increased from 160s to 170s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Hyperbeam cooldown reduced from 130s to 110s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Fixed some issues with lag compensation and Hook
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Ammo increased from 9 to 10
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} self slow on damage duration increased from 1.5s to 2s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} self slow on damage increased from -50% to -65%
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} duration reduced from 15s to 14s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} T1 duration reduced from +20s to +14s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} recent damage window increased from 5s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Curse}} and stuns not interrupting {{PageRef|Ava}} (similar to {{PageRef|Ice Path}} and {{PageRef|Flame Dash}})
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} radius increased from 6.2 to 6.5
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} duration increased from 14s to 16s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} cooldown decreased from 127s to 125s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} T2 cooldown improved from -47s to -50s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Fixed some issues with lag compensation and Lasso
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lasso}} cooldown increased from 100s to 105s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lasso}} T3 improved from -30s Cooldown to -35s
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Afterburn}} headshot buildup rate improved by 10%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: Fixed Turret bugs when thrown at the {{PageRef|Patron}} Throne
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: Base {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} damage increased from 2.6 to 2.7
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Scorn}} spirit scaling increased from 0.39 to 0.42
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} cooldown increased from 75s to 80s
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Flying Cloak}} spirit damage scaling increased from 1.04 to 1.3
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: Fixed Health Regen being 3 instead of 1.5
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Power Surge}} spirit scaling increased from 0.148 to 0.16
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} DPS reduced from 120 to 115
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} T3 reduced from +75 to +70
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} spirit scaling increased from 0.65 to 0.7
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} cooldown increased from 148s to 155s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Alt Fire base damage reduced by 15%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Rage per weapon damage reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} radius increased from 3m to 3.5m
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} radius fixed to scale with radius increase now
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} T2 duration increased from +5s to +7s
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} duration reduced from 10s to 9s
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Bullet damage per boon reduced from 0.74 to 0.6
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} interrupt cooldown increased from 20s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} duration reduced from 3s to 2.75s
